channel.title: "Rock On" Jutsu question
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread ""Rock On" Jutsu question"

item.title: Re: "Rock On" Jutsu question
item.content:encoded: The only strength modifiers (good or bad) that apply in Wastelands are the ones that specifically say 'in the Wastelands' or 'Immune to Wastelands Disease'. Rock On: Spinal Tap is the only jutsu (that I know of) that give a strength modifier in wastelands.

item.title: "Rock On" Jutsu question
item.content:encoded: Do "Rock On" Jutsu cause strength penalties while in the wasteland? I trying to complete the wasteland, and they would be really useful were it not for the strength penalties. Also, do wasteland allies cause strength penalties? TY!
